title: (x) Puma's World Cup uniforms font - custom font by Dalton-Maag {Tiff}
content:
can anyone tell me what font Puma is using for the names on their jerseys at the World Cup? thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [3179274726.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100526153315/http:/typophile.com/files/3179274726.jpg) | 25.03 KB |
author: mleister

comments.content: I'm pretty sure this is custom by [DaMa](http://web.archive.org/web/20100526153315/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/)
I am lovin' this font on the jerseys. It rounds out on tv (or maybe when printed). This world cup is pretty fab too.
